title: Serious Team looking for TOP LANER!
body:
Hi, my Team is looking for a main TOP LANER !
We take every game serious! We want get higher, and play some tournaments if possible.

To us:

We never lost a Teamranked till now
Friendly
Jungler from Denmark, Adc from England and Mid+Supp from Germany - We are talking only in english!
18+
Got Ts3 server

If you think your fit to us then just Add me ingame and write with me, don't be shy! :D

minimum soloq elo: Plat4, pls!
